resources.string:
Hi, my name is Akanksha. 

I like many things. I have many hobbies. 

I like to draw sketches, mandala arts, or any new art which I find interesting. 
I like all sort of paintings. 

Apart from drawing and painting, I like dancing. 
I have learnt various forms of dance like western dance, bhangra etc. 

I love reading books/novels. 
Books keep us motivated. I have read Brida by Paulo Coelho, Alchemist by Paulo Coelho, Rich and Poor dad by Robert T Kiyosaki and many more. 

I like to do volunteer work too. I am a member of Shiksha society in our college. 
We teach under-privileged children from 1st to 12th standard after our college classes. 
We also organise various workshops such as Art and Craft workshop, Science workshop, Career workshop and fest Shikshangan.
